body_html:
@jubjamie
Yes, that's exactly how it would work if you want to take a crack at it :)

Unfortunately the make build doesn't work on Windows out of the box. This is the current easiest way I know of to build Android TensorFlow on Windows. It should be approximately the same amount of effort to use this approach for either make or bazel builds. Hopefully we get cmake working in the near future so we can avoid the extra steps (contributions welcome!)
